update tb_block
blockhash = #{blockhash,jdbcType=CHAR},
height = #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER},

size = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER},

nonce = #{nonce,jdbcType=INTEGER},
previousblock = #{previousblock,jdbcType=CHAR},
nextblock = #{nextblock,jdbcType=CHAR},
where bid = #{bid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_block set blockhash = #{blockhash,jdbcType=CHAR}, height = #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, txSize = #{txsize,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, size = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, difficulty = #{difficulty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=REAL}, version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nonce = #{nonce,jdbcType=INTEGER}, previousblock = #{previousblock,jdbcType=CHAR}, nextblock = #{nextblock,jdbcType=CHAR} where bid = #{bid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
